analysis.summary: The test results show a relatively low pass rate of 60% with two out of five tests failing. The failed tests cover critical functionality such as login with valid credentials and verification of login page elements, indicating potential issues with the core functionality of the application.
coverageGaps: Scenarios to test login with various combinations of valid and invalid credentials
trends: Issues with validation and error handling
recommendations: Investigate and fix the root causes of the failed login test cases
Expand test coverage to include more edge cases and combinations of login credentials
Implement more robust validation and error handling mechanisms
criticalIssues: Failures in login with valid credentials
Failure to verify critical elements on the login page

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
steps.error: Expected to be redirected to overview page

steps.step: Verify that the URL contains '/overview.htm'
Verify that the 'Welcome' message with the customer name is displayed
Verify that the 'Accounts Overview' heading is displayed
Verify that the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances
Verify that the right side navigation menu displays the banking options
Verify that the 'Log Out' link is visible in the top navigation

errors: Step 5: Expected to be redirected to overview page; Step 7: Expected "Welcome" message not found; Step 8: Expected "Accounts Overview" heading not found; Step 11: Expected "Log Out" link not found

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating that the username or password is invalid
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating that the username or password is invalid

results.testName: Login with empty username and password

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating that the username and password fields are required
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Verify that the username field is labeled 'Username:' and accepts text input
Verify that the password field is labeled 'Password:' and masks the input
Verify that the 'Log In' button is clickable when both fields have values
Verify that the 'Log Out' link is visible in the top navigation

errors: Step 5: Expected "Log Out" link not found
